### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=52.0 y=-80.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=52.0 y=-84.0) 

### Lab at position(x=0 y=0)
Consists of following entities
-  Lab (position x=0 y=0) 

### Electricity generator at position(x=5 y=0)
Consists of following entities
-  Steam engine (position x=5.5 y=0.5) 
-  Small electric pole (position x=3.5 y=0.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when crafting items with unlocked recipes
-  Make sure the recipe for the item is unlocked before attempting to craft it.
### Errors when placing entities at occupied positions
-  Ensure the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when placing entities without required items in inventory
-  Make sure you have the required item in your inventory before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when inserting items into entities
-  Ensure the entity can accept the item you are trying to insert and has available space.
### Errors when using incorrect prototypes
-  Use the correct prototype when attempting to insert an item into an entity.
### Errors when placing entities at unplaceable terrain
-  Ensure the target position is not unplaceable terrain (e.g. water) before attempting to place an entity.
### Errors when researching without required items
-  Make sure you have the required items to research a technology before attempting to do so.
### Errors when using entities without power
-  Ensure entities that require power are connected to a power source before attempting to use them.
